if.test: startDate != null and startDate != '' and type!=4
endDate != null and endDate != '' and type!=4
startDate != null and startDate != '' and endDate != null and endDate != '' and type==4

mapper.select: select IFNULL(sum(online_driver_num),0) as onlineDriverAmount, CONCAT(IFNULL(FORMAT(sum(online_driver_num)*100/sum(total_driver_num),1),0),'%') as onlineRate, IFNULL(sum(in_use_driver_num),0) as serviceDriverAmount, CONCAT(IFNULL(FORMAT(sum(in_use_driver_num)*100/sum(total_driver_num),1),0),'%') as serviceRate, IFNULL(sum(push_order_num),0) as distributeOrderAmount, CONCAT(IFNULL(FORMAT(sum(com_order_num)*100/sum(push_order_num),1),0),'%') as completeOrderAmount, IFNULL(FORMAT(sum(bind_order_num)/sum(bind_order_driver_cnt),1),0) as bindOrderAmountPerVehicle, IFNULL(FORMAT(sum(fact_over_order_num)/sum(in_use_driver_num),1),0) as completeOrderPerVehicle, IFNULL(FORMAT(sum(fact_over_amount)/sum(in_use_driver_num),1),0) as incomePerVehicle, IFNULL(FORMAT(sum(fact_over_amount)/sum(fact_over_order_num),1),0) as pricePerOIrder, IFNULL(sum(total_driver_num),0) as totalDriverNum, IFNULL(sum(disinfect_driver_cnt),0) as disinfectDriverCnt, IFNULL(sum(no_disinfect_driver_cnt),0) as noDisinfectDriverCnt, CONCAT(IFNULL(FORMAT(sum(disinfect_driver_cnt)*100/sum(in_use_driver_num),1),0),'%') as disinfectDriverCntRate from ${table}

select DATE_FORMAT(data_date,'%Y/%m/%d') as demenItemName, IFNULL(sum(online_driver_num),0) as onlineDriverAmount, CONCAT(IFNULL(FORMAT(sum(online_driver_num)*100/sum(total_driver_num),1),0),'%') as onlineRate, IFNULL(sum(in_use_driver_num),0) as serviceDriverAmount, CONCAT(IFNULL(FORMAT(sum(in_use_driver_num)*100/sum(total_driver_num),1),0),'%') as serviceRate, IFNULL(sum(push_order_num),0) as distributeOrderAmount, CONCAT(IFNULL(FORMAT(sum(com_order_num)*100/sum(push_order_num),1),0),'%') as completeOrderAmount, IFNULL(FORMAT(sum(bind_order_num)/sum(bind_order_driver_cnt),1),0) as bindOrderAmountPerVehicle, IFNULL(FORMAT(sum(fact_over_order_num)/sum(in_use_driver_num),1),0) as completeOrderPerVehicle, IFNULL(FORMAT(sum(fact_over_amount)/sum(in_use_driver_num),0),0) as incomePerVehicle, IFNULL(FORMAT(sum(fact_over_amount)/sum(fact_over_order_num),1),0) as pricePerOIrder, IFNULL(sum(total_driver_num),0) as totalDriverNum, IFNULL(sum(disinfect_driver_cnt),0) as disinfectDriverCnt, IFNULL(sum(no_disinfect_driver_cnt),0) as noDisinfectDriverCnt, CONCAT(IFNULL(FORMAT(sum(disinfect_driver_cnt)*100/sum(in_use_driver_num),1),0),'%') as disinfectDriverCntRate from bi_driver_disinfect_measure_day
group by data_date
